title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces HDForex as Latest Member Firm

content.rendered:
March 30th, 2014 – Hong Kong & New York: FinaCom LTD operator of FinancialCommission.org, the industry driven neutral mediator serving the online foreign exchange and binary options industry has today announced its newest member firm HDForex.com.

HDForex is a partner of Switzerland’s Dukascopy Bank, and joins the growing list of members who have obtained membership status with the Financial Commission in order to provide customers a non-biased 3rd party to help resolve escalate complaints in cases when customers cannot resolve such issues directly with their broker.

The efficient dispute resolution process of the organization aided by a committee of recognized forex industry professionals provides a value-add to the brokers, such as HDForex, which become members with Financial Commission.

The Financial Commission is industry specialized and tailored uniquely to serve financial services, by providing a cost effective and efficient method available to online market participants via firms who hold membership status with the commission.

The membership status of HDForex joining the Financial Commission effective as of March 30th, 2015 and published in this press release as a public announcement, following approval of their membership application by FinaCom PLC’s board.

Commenting on the new membership approval, Financial Commission Chairman Peter Tatarnikov said, “We are happy to welcome HDForex as our newest member. We trust it is a great step for the broker as well, as it seeks to leverage its credibility and grow its business globally.”

 

HDForex CEO Pavlo Symonenko shared regarding the approval, “Even built a very reputable name in the industry and specifically in Caucasus, we expect that by joining the Financial Commission HDForex will continue to strengthen our value proposition to our customers even more, using a neutral 3rd party.”

 

About the HDForex

HDForex is an online trading firm that offers wide variety of trading products, such as currencies, precious metals, CFDs and stocks. Providing excellent service and quality trading education, they aim to give clients the best trading experience in every type of financial market. HDForex equip traders with innovative products, services and knowledge.

About the Financial Commission

The Financial Commission is an external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes with financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. The Financial Commission set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading the Forex market. The Financial Commission was established to be a neutral 3rd party committee to fairly review and resolve complaints in an effort to facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution than through industry regulators and the legal system

For more information, please contact The Financial Commission – info@financialcommission.org
